channel.title: Code for run.bat for vista users (server code)
channel.description: hey, just wondering if anyone has a wroking run.bat code for there source/server for windows vista. i can't find one that works

item.title: Code for run.bat for vista users (server code)
item.dc:creator: @gelert gelert
item.description:
@gelert wrote:

@echo off
title Your Crapy Server Name
java -Xmx1200m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-1.7.0-ga-bin.jar server
exit

That what i use, and i have vista

Read full topic
item.source: Code for run.bat for vista users (server code)

item.title: Code for run.bat for vista users (server code)
item.dc:creator: @Fluffee Fluffee
item.description:
@Fluffee wrote:

@echo off title server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

There is no specific code for Vista, it’s the same code for other operating systems.
